title.narrative: Programme dAppui au Développement des Economies Locales

description.narrative: Le Programme dAppui au Développement des Economies Locales (PADEL) (2017-2020). Le PNUD exécute la composante2: fournir des services énergétiques modernes et les infrastructures socioéconomiques de base aux populations et aux collectivités

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
